page.title: 18PUBS & CLUBS BRAISHFIELD
page.content:
The following are all within the village of Braishfield.
The NEWPORT INN a small village inn, serving bar snacks,and music on some evenings.Souvenirs from the making of the T.V.series,Worzel Gummidge kept.
The WHEATSHEAF a larger public house with a large childrens play area,and a field set aside for touring caravans. The DOG & CROOK serves bar snacks and has a small garden area. Decorated with bright coloured lights.
The BRAISHFIELD SOCIAL CLUB (C.I.U. appointed) is open to members only, and is situated at Common Hill. The Main Hall is available for private hire.
